title: Instant Ramen Day
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Rin~, the hot water is ready~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Yaaay! Cup ramen, cup ramen♪ Ai-san, do you want the shoyu ramen or the seafood ramen?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Let’s see~.... Ah, that’s right, Ai will take the shoyu one. There’s something Ai wants to try.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Sorry to keep you waiting~, it’s this! Sesame oil!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Sesame oil? Eh, are you going to put that into the shoyu ramen?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>That’s what Ai will show you, cause it’s shoyu, get it♪ It’s a technique of adding a little bit of something else into the cup ramen to give it a new kind of tastiness~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Eeh~, that’s not fair nya~! Rin wants to try adding a little bit of something too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Fufufu, Ai thought you would say that, so Ai brought this.... Tadaa, cheese! Let’s add this cheese to your seafood ramen, Rin♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Waaah! Adding good cheese to good ramen must make it absolutely delicious nya~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ahaha, then let’s just forget about the “little bit” part and add as much as we want!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
